ej,ecked001,P,scotd901,Balls and strikes ej,larut101,M,scotd901,Balls and strikes ej,duncd101,C,scotd901,Balls and strikes ej,neelt001,P,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,nunee001,P,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,reynt101,C,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,folit001,C,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,garnp001,M,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,thond001,P,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,mcgwm001,P,phild901,Bench-clearing brawl $Pitcher Eckersley, Athletics manager LaRussa and Athletics coach Duncan ejected by HP umpire Scott for arguing balls and strikes; LaRussa refused to leave the field and Brewers manager Garner complained about the delay; LaRussa confronted Garner; benches emptied and a brawl started when Athletics Neel tackled Brewers Thon, knocking down Brewers Nilsson as well; Athletics coach Reynolds and Brewers coach Foli fought with each other; the managers and Athletics Aldrete restrained Brewers Surhoff but Athletics Nunez felled Surhoff with a punch that drew blood; ejections by 1B umpire (crew chief): Athletics Neel, Reynolds and McGwire plus Brewers Nunez,Thon, Garner, and Foli
